title: iOS 16: Here’s what we know so far about new features, supported devices, and more
content:
Now that WWDC 2022 has officially been announced, we’re gearing up for the release of iOS 16. This will mark the next major release of Apple’s software platform for the iPhone, as well as iPadOS 16 for the iPad. Head below as we recap all of the latest rumors and expectations for iOS 16 this year, including new features, release info, and more.

more…

The post iOS 16: Here’s what we know so far about new features, supported devices, and more appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: iOS 16 is set to be announced in just a few weeks. Here's what we know so far about new features in iOS 16, supported devices, and more.
